channel.title: Comments on: East Bear Manual Aero Side Mirrors

item.title: By: bert
item.dc:creator: bert
item.description: Good choice on East Bears. Always loved that mirror, just never build a car that had a style cool enough for those mirrors. Get a matching wheel set already lol.
item.content:encoded: Good choice on East Bears. Always loved that mirror, just never build a car that had a style cool enough for those mirrors. Get a matching wheel set already lol.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2016/10/east-bear-manual-aero-side-mirrors/#comment-433966">Damon</a>.
Thanks lol! Buy it off me once I'm done!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Damon
item.dc:creator: Damon
item.description: You are building my dream machine right now. So cool!
item.content:encoded: You are building my dream machine right now. So cool!
